subtasks: Use a chaser harrow or similar equipment to clean up stumps.
Seed lentils in a staggered pattern to prevent overcrowding.

tasks.task: Operate a modern harvester equipped with auto ground pressure monitoring.
subtasks: Adjust the header pressure to a desired setting using a potentiometer.
Monitor ground pressure in real-time using the computer on the harvester.
Open the concave setting on the combine.
Slow down the rotor speed compared to wheat harvesting.
Maintain sieve settings similar to those used for wheat.

tasks.task: Implement fire precautions for lentil residue.
subtasks: Install thermal blankets around the exhaust and turbo areas.
Utilize on-farm storage solutions for lentil grains.

tasks.task: Consider initial investment and storage options for lentils.
subtasks: Construct a shed with adequate storage capacity (e.g., 2,000 tonnes).
Cover storage areas with tarps for extended protection (e.g., 6-7 months).
Use a chaser harrow to clean up stumps (paddock preparation).
Seed lentils early (e.g., mid-April) to ensure vigour and yield.
Properly roll the paddock after seeding with a seeder.

tasks.task: Operate a modern harvester equipped with auto ground pressure monitoring
subtasks: Adjust header pressure using a potentiometer.
Monitor ground pressure in real-time via the harvester’s computer.
Navigate around stumps using auto detection systems.
Open the concave setting to allow proper grain flow.
Slow down the rotor speed compared to wheat.
Keep sieve settings similar to wheat to prevent damage.

tasks.task: Implement fire precautions for lentil residue
subtasks: Install thermal blankets around exhaust and turbo sections.

tasks.task: Consider initial investment and storage options for lentils
